means: <意><音>乐曲的速度或拍子( tempo的名词复数 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: tempestuousness 剧烈tempi 拍子Templar 圣堂武士

list.abs: cui song and jin zhong - shan tempie ., 翠松与金钟山寺.

entry.def: Tempi is a plural of tempo .

auth_sentence.content: His brilliant tempi never seem over-driven.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His brilliant tempi never seem over-driven.

auth_sentence.content: Only Tilson Thomas's over-relaxed tempi meant the final spark never quite ignited.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only Tilson Thomas's over-relaxed tempi meant the final spark never quite ignited.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only Tilson Thomas's over-relaxed tempi meant the final spark never quite ignited.

auth_sentence.content: On the whole, Fischer's tempi are winningly fleet and vivacious, and always vividly recorded.
auth_sentence.res_content: On the whole, Fischer's tempi are winningly fleet and vivacious, and always vividly recorded.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On the whole, Fischer's tempi are winningly fleet and vivacious, and always vividly recorded.
